Description: Precision of geographic coordinates, as reported by source or estimated from maps.
Motivation: allow identification of records with poor coordinate precision

Description: Location of data within the source listed in citation.ID.
Standard deviation, standard error, and lower and upper 95 percent confidence intvervals, respectively.
Motivation: cleaner format; ability to handle assymetrical 95 percent confidence intervals

Description: mean value and units presented in original publication
Motivation: provide IPCC with original units, reduce errors/improve reproducibility

Description: Assumed/ measured C content of organic matter used to convert organic matter to C.
Motivation: track units conversion, allow back-calculation of OM if conversion factor deemed inappropriate

Description: Definition of the pftcode at the community level. Differs from individual level in that properly describes mixed plant functional types.
Definition of the pftcode at the individual plant level.
